00132 // The following command is used for the
00133 // doxygen documentation program. doxygen is forced to include the
00134 // source code of the named example program into the documentation,
00135 // that then can be linked directly.
00136 // This "dirty trick" is necessary, because to put "\example [filename]"

00150 //===========================================================================
00178   RBFNet( unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden )
00179     : RBFN( numInput, numOutput, numHidden ) {
00180     ModelInterface::inputDimension = numInput;
00181     ModelInterface::outputDimension = numOutput;   
00182     ModelInterface::w.resize(b.nelem()+A.nelem()+m.nelem()+v.nelem());
00183     ModelInterface::dmdw.resize(odim(),b.nelem()+A.nelem()+m.nelem()+v.nelem());
00184     ModelInterface::dedw.resize(b.nelem()+A.nelem()+m.nelem()+v.nelem());
00185     getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00186   }

00214 RBFNet(const std::string &filename)
00215 {
00216   std::ifstream input(filename.c_str());
00217   if(!input)
00218     {
00219       std::cerr << "cannot open net file " << filename << std::endl;
00220       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00221     }
00222   input >> *this;
00223   input.close();
00224 }

00228 //===========================================================================
00263 RBFNet(unsigned numInput, unsigned numOutput, unsigned numHidden,
00264        const Array<double> &_m, 
00265        const Array<double> &_A, 
00266        const Array<double> &_b, 
00267        const Array<double> &_v)
00268   : RBFN( numInput, numOutput, numHidden ) { 
00269   outputDimension = numOutput;
00270   inputDimension  = numInput;
00271   
00272   m = _m; v = _v; A = _A; b = _b;
00273   
00274   ModelInterface::w.resize( b.nelem( ) +  // bias
00275                             A.nelem( ) +  // weights
00276                             m.nelem( ) +  // centers
00277                             v.nelem( ) ); // variances
00278   ModelInterface::dmdw.resize( odim( ),
00279                                b.nelem( ) +
00280                                A.nelem( ) +
00281                                m.nelem( ) +
00282                                v.nelem( ) );
00283   ModelInterface::dedw.resize( b.nelem( ) +
00284                                A.nelem( ) +
00285                                m.nelem( ) +
00286                                v.nelem( ) );
00287   getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00288 }

00346   void model( const Array< double >& input, Array< double >& target ){
00347     setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00348     recall( input, target );
00349   }

00369   void dmodel( const Array< double >& input ){
00370     setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00371     gradientOut( input, ModelInterface::dmdw );
00372   }

00374 //===========================================================================
00394   void dmodel( const Array< double >& input, Array< double >& output  ){
00395     setParams( ModelInterface::w );
00396     recall( input, output );
00397     gradientOut( input, ModelInterface::dmdw );
00398   }

00546   void setWeights(const Array<double>& _A){
00547     if((A.ndim()==_A.ndim()) && (A.dim(0)==_A.dim(0)) && (A.dim(1)==_A.dim(1))) 
00548       A=_A;
00549     getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00550   }
00551 
00552 //===========================================================================
00573   void setBias(const Array<double>& _b){
00574     if((b.ndim()==_b.ndim()) && (b.dim(0)==_b.dim(0)))
00575       b=_b;
00576     getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00577   }
00578 
00579 //===========================================================================
00601   void setCenter(const Array<double>& _m){
00602     if((m.ndim()==_m.ndim()) && (m.dim(0)==_m.dim(0)) && (m.dim(1)==_m.dim(1)))
00603       m=_m;
00604     getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00605   }

00629   void setVariance(const Array<double>& _v){
00630     if((v.ndim()==_v.ndim()) && (v.dim(0)==_v.dim(0)) && (v.dim(1)==_v.dim(1))) 
00631       v=_v;
00632     getParams( ModelInterface::w );
00633   }

00662 inline std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& os, RBFNet &net)
00663 {
00664   Array<double> tmp;
00665   tmp = net.getCenter();
00666   os << tmp.dim(1) << " " ;
00667   tmp = net.getBias();
00668   os << tmp.dim(0) << " " ;
00669   os << net.getNHidden() << "\n\n";
00670   writeArray(net.getWeights(), os,"","\n",' ');
00671   writeArray(net.getBias(), os,"","\n",' ');
00672   os << "\n";
00673   writeArray(net.getCenter(), os,"","\n",' ');
00674   writeArray(net.getVariance(), os,"","\n",' ');
00675 
00676   return os;
00677 }

00680 //===========================================================================
00705 inline std::istream& operator>> (std::istream& is, RBFNet &net)
00706 {
00707   unsigned i,j;
00708   unsigned NumInput, NumOutput, NumHidden;
00709   is >> NumInput >> NumOutput >> NumHidden;
00710 
00711   net.a.resize(NumHidden);
00712   for(i=0; i < net.a.dim(0); i++)
00713     net.a(i) = 1.0 / NumHidden;
00714 
00715   Array<double> Weights(NumOutput, NumHidden);
00716   Array<double> Bias(NumOutput);
00717   Array<double> Center(NumHidden, NumInput);
00718   Array<double> Variance(NumHidden, NumInput);
00719 
00720 
00721   for(i=0; i < Weights.dim(0); i++)
00722     for(j=0; j < Weights.dim(1); j++)
00723       is >> Weights(i,j);
00724 
00725   for(i=0; i < Bias.dim(0); i++)
00726     is >> Bias(i);
00727 
00728   for(i=0; i < Center.dim(0); i++)
00729     for(j=0; j < Center.dim(1); j++)
00730       is >> Center(i,j);
00731 
00732    for(i=0; i < Variance.dim(0); i++)
00733     for(j=0; j < Variance.dim(1); j++)
00734       is >> Variance(i,j);
00735 
00736 
00737 
00738 
00739    net.A.resize(NumOutput, NumHidden);
00740    net.b.resize(NumOutput);
00741    net.m.resize(NumHidden, NumInput);
00742    net.v.resize(NumHidden, NumInput);
00743 
00744 
00745    net.setWeights(Weights);
00746    net.setBias(Bias);
00747    net.setCenter(Center);
00748    net.setVariance(Variance);
00749 
00750    net.ModelInterface::inputDimension = NumInput;
00751    net.ModelInterface::outputDimension = NumOutput;
00752    net.ModelInterface::w.resize(net.b.nelem()+net.A.nelem()+net.m.nelem()+net.v.nelem());
00753    net.ModelInterface::dmdw.resize(net.odim(),net.b.nelem()+net.A.nelem()+net.m.nelem()+net.v.nelem());
00754    net.ModelInterface::dedw.resize(net.b.nelem()+net.A.nelem()+net.m.nelem()+net.v.nelem());
00755    net.getParams( net.ModelInterface::w );
00756 
00757    return is;
00758 }
